00001 <?php
00002 
00003 include_once('CMError.php');
00004 include_once('CMObject.php');
00005 
00015 class CMDecimal extends CMError implements CMObject {
00016  
00020  private $f = '0';
00021  
00025  private $size = 18;
00026  
00033  private $prec = 6;
00034  
00042  public function CMDecimal($size, $prec, $value = 0) {
00043   $this->size = $size;
00044   $this->prec = $prec;
00045   $this->set($value);
00046  }
00047  
00059  public function set($value) {
00060   // get the raw number
00061   $p = explode('.', $value);
00062   
00063   // truncate
00064   if(strlen($p[0]) > ($this->size - $this->prec))
00065    return $this->throwError("Out of range", array('value' => $value));
00066    
00067   if(count($p) > 1 && strlen($p[1]) > $this->prec) {
00068    $this->throwWarning("Number truncated", array('value' => $value));
00069    $p[1] = substr($p[1], 0, $this->prec);
00070   }
00071   
00072   // pad
00073   for($i = strlen($p[1]); $i < $this->prec; ++$i)
00074    $p[1] .= '0';
00075   
00076   // set
00077   if($this->prec > 0)
00078    $this->f = "$p[0].$p[1]";
00079   else $this->f = $p[0];
00080   
00081   return $this;
00082  }
00083  
00096  public function add($value) {
00097   if(!($value instanceof CMDecimal))
00098    $value = new CMDecimal($this->size, $this->prec, $value);
00099   return new CMDecimal($this->size, $this->prec, bcadd($this->f, $value, $this->prec));
00100  }
00101  
00114  public function subtract($value) {
00115   if(!($value instanceof CMDecimal))
00116    $value = new CMDecimal($this->size, $this->prec, $value);
00117   return new CMDecimal($this->size, $this->prec, bcsub($this->f, $value, $this->prec));
00118  }
00119  
00132  public function multiply($value) {
00133   if(!($value instanceof CMDecimal))
00134    $value = new CMDecimal($this->size, $this->prec, $value);
00135   return new CMDecimal($this->size, $this->prec, bcmul($this->f, $value, $this->prec));
00136  }
00137  
00150  public function divide($value) {
00151   if(!($value instanceof CMDecimal))
00152    $value = new CMDecimal($this->size, $this->prec, $value);
00153   return new CMDecimal($this->size, $this->prec, bcdiv($this->f, $value, $this->prec));
00154  }
00155  
00159  public function zero() {
00160   return new CMDecimal($this->size, $this->prec, 0);
00161  }
00162  
00166  public function one() {
00167   return new CMDecimal($this->size, $this->prec, 1);
00168  }
00169  
00175  public function __toString() {
00176   return $this->f;
00177  }
00178  
00179 }
